thank you for the feedback on your recent experience with Bassano. We are pleased to know that you have enjoyed the view at our venue. Also, we are upset that our service seemed too slow.

Here, at both Bassano Ristorante and Dolceteka, we take pride of what we do and of our product. One of our core values ‚Äì¬†is Guest Satisfaction.
